message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. Could we agree on $11,200? It's a fair compromise.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit above $11,000. How about $11,100?
